General.Name: Bitech Technologies Corporation
General.Description: Bitech Technologies Corporation focuses on providing a suite of green energy solutions with a focus on green data centers, commercial and residential utility, EV infrastructure, and other renewable energy initiatives. It focuses on developing Evirontek, a technology integrated platform that includes renewable energy system solutions and chipset solutions. The company is based in Newport Beach, California.
General.Address: 600 Anton Boulevard, Costa Mesa, CA, United States, 92626
